synopsis.text: Mahiro's peaceful existence as a reclusive gamer is turned upside down when he wakes up one day to find himself transformed into a woman. His genius younger sister, Mihari, has used him as a guinea pig for one of her experiments, resulting in this unexpected change. Mahiro, who was content with his solitary life of playing erotic video games, now finds himself thrust into a world of chaos and confusion. As he navigates through this new reality, he realizes that his quiet life is a thing of the past, and the world is eager to engage with him in ways he never imagined. Will Mahiro be able to adapt to this drastic change, or will he yearn for his old life as a recluse? Only time will tell in this intriguing and unpredictable anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
